messages.body:
Good Day My Dear!! 
I want to thank you for helping me out in that last transaction which went successful,However,I am now in Australia where I am now investing my own share of the fund,as I'd promised to compensate you after everything.I have contacted my Bank to confirm if you have received the compensation payment of ( $900,000 USD UNITED STATES DOLLARS ) which I issued in your name,but they told me that they could not transfer it to you because you did not afford to pay the tranfser charges.  
I have instructed my Bank to cancel any payment regards to the Bank Draft and then authorized them to Credit the Fund into ATM MASTER CARD in your name which they have done. 
As of now be informed that the ATM CARD has been registered with Fedex Express Company,and all charges has been paid,but
messages.raw:
FCCS
(9:00 PM)
